sentences: Korterisse saab võtta ainult väikese koera.
Ainult väike osa ekspordist läheb Aasiasse.
context: The Estonian word 'väike' is an adjective that means small, little, or low. It can be used to describe something with below average dimensions (size), scope, total, volume; lower than average in number, quantity, percentage, etc.; short in time or duration; or of low intensity or degree. The word has several case forms including väikese (genitive/partitive), väiksem (comparative), and kõige väiksem (superlative). It also has a variant form 'väikene' which is sometimes used.
